list_of_reviews.review: Terrible. Lost google authetificator for my account i created like two years ago. Sent all photos / identification picture. It keep asking about questions you can't really answer (like detail of transaction) if you just opened a small account you almost forgot. I mean here i am with pictures they asked, with writings and poses plus id picture but no luck. It seems they will intentionally keep your lost account for themselves.Will change rating if #1317959 resolved. It's beyond horrible.

Ticket Number #1316792I really like the Website of Gate.io, but my funds are locked after trying to withdraw "verifying".I submitted all the requested documents, I would like to use Gate.io more. Please resolve my Ticket and release my funds.I will update the Review after that is solved #1316792.

Hi,Ticket Number: 1313472. I tried to withdraw some of my assets but I am on verifying for awl week. I have sent over 40 replies and all the documents they requested but the issue has not resolved yet. The fact that I want to withdraw more assets in the near future is what makes it even more terrifying for me. What in other platforms takes seconds in Gate.io takes probably (? not resolved yet) more that a week (at least) and many messages.Edit: They resolved the issue!Thanks

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ticket Number: 1108911 (Withdrawals Stuck in "Verifying" for 10 Days)
list_of_reviews.review: Hi Gate.io,I've completed my KYC and completed the EDD Questionnaire, but my three withdrawals have been stuck in "Verifying" status for 10 days. Withdrawals should only take a few minutes.This delay is unacceptable.Please resolve this within 24 hours, or I'll leave 1-star reviews on all review platforms. Once resolved, I'll remove this 1-star review.

list_of_reviews.review_title: TOTAL SCAM, TICKET IS NOT SOLVED FOR 6 MONTH!!!
list_of_reviews.review: I were using Gate.io for more then year.  I had VIP level 5, everything was fine until October 11, 2023 my trading was blocked. Any opportunity to buy, sell, withdraw were disabled.The error was "The system has detected a security risk with your account, so we have activated the account fund protection function for you. To disable the function, please submit a ticket and contact customer support." I have immidiately created ticket #1182243. The support were only sending the default messages like i need to wait patiently and the team is working on my case. Then on 4th month of ticket they requested statements, proof of work and income. I had provided everything they have asked for.Later the error message was rephrased as "Your account has been placed under protection due to detected potential risks. To lift this protection, please submit a ticket.".Ticket is unsolved for 6 month already.Last reply from Gate.io in ticket was month ago. They are simply ignoring my messages or sending default one: The team is working on my issue and so on...6 months have passed but I still haven't any information about a reason of blocking, Gate.io havent explained anything.I have messaged Gate.io support via email, i had created topic on Reddit, i had messaged support in X(Twitter), tried to contact my manager via Telegram - nothing helped!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: My account on gate.io is banned for some unknown reason.
list_of_reviews.review: I am daily trader on gate.io, today suddenly i tried to withdraw then i get pop-up that i cant do that because of my account protection and due to potential risk my account is on hold and i should create a ticket so i created ticked id but did not get any response from them. The ticket number is 1110366Its already 4days and what i got to listen from gate io is, wait we are looking after this.

It's a scam. they failed to get their house in order, and are now asking for verification on accounts. Arbitrarily decline the verification and say they will freeze all assets within 7 days.They lie about tickets being submitted (say they are not from your own account so won't process them), refuse to allow transfers out below a certain amount, but say you will lose access unless you transfer your money out.Just totally geared up to steal money under the pretence of abiding by regulations (which they aren't).Update: the reply below is BS and not  reflective of how these scammers are operating. I already did KYC when I opened the account. They've asked for a new address verification, which I provided. Their response was simply that it had failed and my assets would be frozen in 7 days. Nothing about another way to verify, and no way to remove funds. Submitted a ticket. They lied when I followed up and said the ticket wasn't submitted from my account. Provided further evidence... Silence.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This is a scamming website folks
list_of_reviews.review: This is a scamming website folks. They are requesting fill out files which they don't even send and try to get your card number to drain more money from you.At my first transactions everything went smooth however after making withdrawal they blocked in order to make „verification” process. Ticket id: 1314790PS. I completed KYC BEFORE making any transactions!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid using this platform. I feel like I am getting scammed.
list_of_reviews.review: I feel like I am getting scammed.I bought ~$10,000 USDT with my card using GATE CONNECT and tried to withdraw it to my Binance Account. After I made the withdraw, they took it on "Verifying" state and I received a text message saying it usually takes 1-8 hours. After 1 month and sending bunch of documents, proof of identity pictures and questionnaires. I am still waiting to get my money. Avoid using this platform if you want to get your money fast. I don't even know if I will get my money or not. I will edit my review if I receive my money.Ticket Number: #1305119

Ticket id 1107918Had prior ticket opened 2 months ago and closed without resolution or on how to proceed with the funds in my accWhen i withdraw error says account under protection been 2 months 0 helpNo help or update or resolution been 2 months am going to attorney now to file case this is beyond wait 60 days and no one telling me why and how can we unlock my account !!
Its crazy how they handle ticket for deposit without memo. It can be more than 1 day!!! Dont open cex if you dont have competent service agent to handle your problem!!!!!

They allow you to use their platform till a certain threshold which you never know what that threshold is, its just obvious that they have such thing by purpose. Once you passed that threshold, they block your withdraws in the state of "verifying" which is when they ask you to send them some documents to prove your identity, bank account statement blabla and thats where they never answer your emails or requests or tickets properly and keep you in this blocked state till forever no matter how much you contact them. They constantly say we will get back to you, we will review it, or they just send some irrelevant automated answers. Even these unhelpful responses each takes 1,2 days at least for you to receive which again keeps you in such blocked state forever. Its been few weeks so far and although I have sent them even more documents than what they have asked, but still no supports from them I have received. Their online chat support person tells you sth like "oh we are so sorry, I will escalate this to our review team/ senior team blabla" which never ever did a thing to my case and nobody got back to me. Complete scam. Avoid for sure. I'm going to claim my monies back from my credit card support as I have proof of all my communications with them already.
Tragic. They are holding my money and pretend they are contacting me. Nice joke. Lost week of my life for intensive writing with them…

Still I didn’t have any good experience, I open my account long time and deposit and bought some crypto. This month when am trying to log in to my account I cannot. I have the email and phone number and password, but when it comes to Authenticator I am stuck there. I tried to reset my Authenticator and also contact customer service. Request 1284933.  Now 10 days nothing happen. I am wondering now is it reliable to depend on gate.io or no?? They reply me they will check. Still hoe many days nothing happen.. I believe it's gate.io is fraud.. I don't advise anybody to use

scam gate.io , you stole the money from the people ,as what happened with me , bad customer service , they don't give any solution , my account not opened from more 8 months .my adviced to people to take their money befor they close your account as it happened with me .

Ticket number (1276676)I've been constantly writing emails about my situation and nobody has written or answered. This problem has never happened to me before with any crypto exchange app. Their support services just disappeared I'm not the only one that thinks they are scamming.

@gate_io is a FRAUD CEX who dont know how to migrate tokens. They support thieves and stole users money to give to scammers. Saitama to Saitachain migration is an example. Gate.io is keeping users money to cover their mistakes. 58% of Saitachain coins (millions of $) of over 2550 users are frozen or were stolen. For over 4 months they say that they still communicating with the token's team but they are lying. Avoid this exchange. You can end up without money. 🚩🚩🚩🚩

Steady performance. Great start-up projects and free airdrops. High security. Easy withdrawal to reddot card in almost no time. I suggest to change the VIP tiers and make it more flexible to allow higher shares in start-ups.

Ticket number 1067993I have made a withdrawal over 4 days ago and it still shows as "verifying" I submitted kyc and proof of address, still nothing. I tried contacting support through live chat and it shows like 100 people in front of me and wait time 1 hour. When I refresh after a while it stays the same.Please have a look and release the fundsEDIT: thanks for your looking into it. I received it now.

They are FRAUD - take your money and then lock you out of your account. Do not invest and stay far away from them. Customer service only replies to ask you for a million documents. And once you have given them all the proof of identity, photos and other requests for them to help you access your account, they disappear and no longer respond. keeping your money and locked out of your account access. I have dealt with Camille and Vicky from the gate io team, and received no reply once all documentation asked for was provided. Due to the lack of reply from the Gate io support team there are 3 support ticket requests outstanding with no follow up and multiple attempts asking for a response. You can find all my emails under my email Gate.io

trying to get some assets on my own wallet,the transfer blocked / suspended.10 days and counting, where everyday you need to give always more of your personal data it's so oppressive.TL;DR : If you want an exchange to transfer assets to your own wallet, do NOT use GateIO until you have an entire month to waste, giving them all of your personal life.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Support isn't responding and isn't helpful
list_of_reviews.review: I made a transfer to the wrong blockchain some time ago. However, the coins were redirected to the main account internally by Gate.io. Upon my support request, I was informed that I could have the coins returned for a fee of $100. After initiating the process and the $100 fee being deducted from my account, I never received the coins. In response to a support ticket, I was told that the technical team needed to handle it and I should be patient. It's been over four months now, nothing has happened, and the support team isn't responding anymore... Ticket-Number ist: 1007692

I have sent into Gate.io 0.5ETH worth of token. The token I've sent in was suspended (I've sent in daily basis, so I haven't checked every time). I asked them immediately to send back the tokens to my wallet, they asked me to be patient, because there is "maintenance". I asked them first weekly, after that monthly. Currently those tokens worth nothing, a year passed, no reaction to my ticket (857576) and they also closed it.Consider it before register here, that you wont get any help from them.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of the company present a dichotomy of experiences, indicating inconsistency in service quality. Key issues highlighted by dissatisfied customers include untrustworthy practices and poor customer service, suggesting a need for the company to address transparency and improve its support channels. On the other hand, some users report satisfactory experiences, indicating that the company is capable of successful transactions. This mixed feedback points to a potential variability in the company's operational execution. For improvement, the company should investigate the root causes of negative reviews, standardize its service delivery to ensure reliability, and enhance customer support to build trust and satisfaction.
